1.Title: Knight Beam: Change
1.Description: Increases the equipper's <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> against the target by <color=#2BAD00>36%</color> for 8s upon hitting an enemy at least 6 meters away with a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>.

2.Title: Knight Beam: Change
2.Description: Increases the equipper's <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> against the target by <color=#2BAD00>41%</color> for 8s upon hitting an enemy at least 6 meters away with a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>.
